body_html:
I have solve the problem, check that --filename_tensor_name=save/Const:0 is your situation, the default filename_tensor_name is "save/Const:0". I found that my filename_tensor_name is "deploy/save/Const:0", and restore_op_name is "deploy/save/restore_all".
So just pass the params to the script like this:--restore_op_name=deploy/save/restore_all --filename_tensor_name=deploy/save/Const:0, the problem solved.
body_text:

So just pass the params to the script like this:--restore_op_name=deploy/save/restore_all --filename_tensor_name=deploy/save/Const:0, the problem solved.
body:
I have solve the problem, check that --filename_tensor_name=save/Const:0 is your situation, the default filename_tensor_name is "save/Const:0". I found that my  filename_tensor_name is "deploy/save/Const:0", and restore_op_name is "deploy/save/restore_all".
So just pass the params to the script like this:--restore_op_name=deploy/save/restore_all --filename_tensor_name=deploy/save/Const:0, the problem solved.
